content:
Currently we hide the "send" button if the user has selected "Press Enter to Send". I recently was trying to paste something (using right click> paste) and send it as a message, and I was unable to send it using just the mouse. Anyone else feels the same way?

I would suggest showing the button regardless of the enter key setting. Thoughts?
interesting idea, and seems reasonable. Do you know what other apps do here?
by the way, feel free to open an issue and/or do this barring thoughts from other people; I think it is a good idea.
+1 for @Rohitt Vashishtha 's suggestion, this has happened to me also.
